description: An Alexa Skill for interacting with Product Hunt using their API. This skill allows you to specify a category (tech, podcasts, games or books) and it will list out the featured products for that category for today from the product hunt website.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Product Hunt for hunts for games.
Alexa, ask Product Hunt what are the hunts for books?
imageAltText: Today's Featured on Product Hunt icon
name: Today's Featured on Product Hunt
shortDescription: An Alexa Skill for interacting with Product Hunt.
